All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, SysPropertyAdder
public class StartApplication
extends DeployingTaskBase

Start an SF application, an application which will run asynchronously until stopped by another mechanism. A smartfrog daemon must already be running on the target machine/port
